column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque is some of the best food for the best prices in all of Chicago.  We have had everything on the menu at least once
column2: and you honestly can't go wrong...but the fact that you don't even need a knife to slice the brisket makes it the best!  Also
column3: the sauce that comes with each meal will knock your socks off.  Seating is a little tight
column4: but even during the busiest of times
column5: the staff does a good job getting everyone who wants to dine in a seat before their food is ready.  But do be aware
column7: the line can be out the door and around the corner...
